channel.title: How to download onlder version of kicksecure?
channel.description:
Is there a way to download older versions of the software specifically the one before the system split.
While i think its a great feature it is causing me too much pain in the ass. Also today i installed it in a new hard drive and the option to remove systemsplit is gone completely.

item.title: How to download onlder version of kicksecure?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Banebere:

Is there a way to download older versions of the software specifically the one before the system split.

No.

Banebere:

Also today i installed it in a new hard drive and the option to remove systemsplit is gone completely.

1 topic = 1 forum topic please.
If you wish to fix this, please open a new forum thread and post a screenshot.

Read full topic
item.source: How to download onlder version of kicksecure?
